CAT I.description: Any vulnerability that can result in loss of Confidentiality, Availability, or Integrity

CAT II.description: Any vulnerability that can result in loss of Confidentiality, Availability, or Integrity with mitigating factors

CAT III.description: Any vulnerability that degrades measures to protect against loss of Confidentiality, Availability, or Integrity

WN11-SO-000001.title: SMBv1 Protocol Must Be Disabled
WN11-SO-000001.description: SMBv1 protocol must be disabled on Windows 11 systems to prevent security vulnerabilities
WN11-SO-000001.check_content: Verify SMB1Protocol Windows Optional Feature is disabled
WN11-SO-000001.notes: Requires administrative privileges. System restart may be required.
